short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Designed to auto fill temmplates and values for narritive

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing a handy tool that's here to make writing reports and narratives easier for EMS professionals. We know burnout is a big issue in EMS, and a lot of it comes from the time-consuming paperwork. Our tool helps by giving you ready-made narratives, so you can get your reports done faster without worrying about privacyâ€”no patient info is ever stored or shared.

With just a few keyboard shortcuts, you can pick the type of call and instantly get a detailed narrative template. These templates are based on years of experience and thousands of reports, so they're a great starting point. This way, you can spend less time writing and more time on the important stuff.

Make your report writing faster and less stressful with our simple, easy-to-use tool, designed to help EMS professionals beat burnout.
